The spirit that has been shown to others by some in positions of trust in our institutions, does not 


                      -13- 

harmonize with these words. The wrong spirit they have manifested has been caught by others, and if zeal and wisdom were shown in setting the heads of our institutions right, so many would not be turned out of the way. "Beware of the leaven of the Pharisees," said Christ; guard against the influence which they exert.
